contents.title: Hitman 3 Dubai (UAE) - (In)Security Walkthrough
contents.body:
Hitman 3 Dubai (UAE) – (In)Security Walkthrough

[NATIVADS]

(In)Security is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dubai, United Arab Emirates (On Top of the World quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 (In)Security.

Make sure you track this from the Mission Stories Menu to be given waypoints where to go.

Infiltrate the Staff Area

On Floor Level 2, in the Security Room (named area on map) you can overhear two security guards talk about a new personal bodyguard for our target Stuyvesant, who is supposed to start his job today. Because nobody knows him yet, it would be ideal for us to switch into his uniform.

Locate the Missing Recruit

He will be around the kitchen/changing area on Floor Level 0.

Acquire the Recruit’s Orders

Inside the Changing Room, there are some papers we need to obtain.

Disguise yourself as the Recruit

Lure him into a secluded area and dress up.

Present yourself at the Security Office

Head back up the stairs and report to the Guards in the security room where the mission opportunity started.

Wait for Marcus in the Security Office

The guard will call our target over now.

Give your Orders to Stuyvesant

Hand him “your” paperwork. He will be impressed by your resume and accept you as his bodyguard.

Follow Stuyvesant to the Balcony

Follow him around the corridors and listen to what he has to say. He will lead you to a balcony and asks for a demonstration of your knife-throwing skills.

Hit the Four Targets with the Knives

He wants us to hit 4 moving targets with some knives to test our abilities. With the auto lock-on-aim it is done in no-time.

After this the mission story finishes. Stuyvesant will send away his other guard and you can push him over the edge of the roof for a clean kill if you like.

[NATIVADS]

This finishes the (In)Security Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Dubai.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dubai (UAE) - Bird of Prey Walkthrough
contents.body:
Bird of Prey is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dubai, United Arab Emirates (On Top of the World quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Bird of Prey.

Make sure you track this from the Mission Stories Menu to be given waypoints where to go.

Disguise yourself as Zana “The Vulture” Kazem

[NATIVADS]

The man of our interest roams in the Garden Area on Floor Level 01. Distract him by turning on the sound system in the garden or throwing something in a corner that can’t be seen by others. Knock him out and take his clothes.

Talk to Omar al-Ghazali’s Personal Assistant

We are now approaching a frisk zone – so dispose of all illegal items. After passing the frisk, head up the stairs and talk to the woman in the yellow attire.

Follow the Assistant to the Meeting Room

Follow her up a few flights of stairs until you reach the Conference Room.

Wait for Ingram in the Meeting Room

Our target will arrive in about a minute.

Liste to what Ingram has to say

Sit down and listen to his problem. Ingram will hand us a picture of a nosy journalist in the crowd which he wants to be dealt with.

Locate Hans Lucht

He will walk somewhere between the Black Gold Bar and the Podium of the speech. He is easily recognized by his purple blazer. Check your intel-menu for a picture of him.

Take a picture of Hans Lucht incapacitated

Approach and talk to him. Now, he will follow you basically anywhere. Take him to a secluded spot where you can knock him out. Once he is down, take out your camera and get a clear picture of his head.

Bring the Picture to the Assistant

Make your way back to the Assistant and hand her the Picture.

Follow the Assistant to the Penthouse

Follow her again up some stairs and into the Penthouse to meet with Ingram.

Talk with Ingram

Approach him to complete this opportunity.

[NATIVADS]

Here, you can get another special kill needed for a trophy, which is to smash him onto his miniature Oil Rig Model. This is a statue on a desk. When he stands at it facing this mini statue you can push him from behind to smash his head into it. There’s one guard in the room who will be alarmed, but you can quickly run to him and knock him out after the kill.

This finishes the Bird of Prey Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Dubai.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dubai (UAE) - How the Mighty Fall Walkthrough
contents.body:
How the Mighty Fall is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dubai, United Arab Emirates (On Top of the World quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 How the Mighty Fall.

[NATIVADS]

Make sure you track this from the Mission Stories Menu to be given waypoints where to go.

Infiltrate the Staff Area

The entrance to the Staff Area is directly one Level above the starting point of this Map. It is locked by a code (4706).

Follow Grey’s Instructions

Lucas, who is hacking into the towers systems, shows us a video feed of a camera, showing the code on a whiteboard. Type in 4706 to enter the area.

Locate the Scenic Route

To navigate the hallways, 47 needs to put on a staff disguise. Luckily, someone is standing nearby, with a cabinet to dispose of him almost next to him. The vacuum cleaner can be used as a distraction.

We need to walk through the hallway and into a storage area facing the outside of the tower. Inside will be two persons, which can be distracted and knocked out.

Scan the window sensor with your camera, so Grey can unlock it remotely. Climb out of the window and shimmy along to the right side and up the pipe. Scan the window at the end and climb inside.

Find the Server Room

Now, we are in need of a new disguise, because the current one is not allowed on this floor. Head into the Storage Room, which is the second door to the left. It has a Maintenance Staffer, who would be ideal for a fresh set of clothes. Also, this room leads straight through to the Server Room we need to head to.

Use the Access Terminal

[NATIVADS]

Interact with the console in the middle of the room.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dartmoor (England) - Means, Motive and Opportunity Walkthrough
contents.body:
Means, Motive and Opportunity is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dartmoor, England (Death in the Family quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Means, Motive and Opportunity. Learn how to figure out the murder mystery, investigate all locations of interest and find the correct murder suspect.

[NATIVADS]

Follow the private investigator

First, climb over the broken wall on the right side and follow the investigator into the manor (hide in the bushes and climb through window to the right of main entrance).

Disguise yourself as the private investigator

Take him down silently when he’s stopping in the corridor. You can store his body in a closet at the end of the corridor, just keep the doors on the side of the corridor shut so nobody sees you dragging him.

Meet Alexa Carlisle in the Foyer

Go meet Alexa in the Foyer (while disguised as the investigator).

Follow Mr. Fernsby

Follow Mr. Fernsby the Butler. He leads you upstairs to Zachary’s room, the guy who died.

Investigate Zachary’s Bedroom

Investigate all clues in this room (also equip your camera to take photos of the corpse in the bed and the glasses on the nightstand to the right of the bed). You can see photograph clues on the map (press Touchpad).

Ask Mr. Fernsby for more information

When you’re done investigating the room, return to Mr. Fernsby who should be in the entrance hall downstairs.

Question suspects and search locations of interest

How to Question all Suspects:

This is the complicated part. You must interview people around the house, they are all found on the ground floor (Level 0 on the map). You can see what they look like and who you’ve interviewed under “Intel Tab” > “Suspects” (remember what they are wearing to spot them easily).

[NATIVADS]

There are 5 Suspects: Gregory Carlisle, Edward Carlisle, Rebecca Carlisle, Emma Carlisle, Patrick Carlisle.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dartmoor (England) - Her Final Resting Place Walkthrough
contents.body:
Her Final Resting Place is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dartmoor, England (Death in the Family quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Her Final Resting Place.

Make sure you track this from the Mission Stories Menu to be given waypoints where to go.

[NATIVADS]

Get rid of the Birds Nesting in the Graveyard

Go to the graveyard (named area on left side of map). The trees at the Graveyard are inhabited by crows, much to the family’s displeasure. Ideally, you want to shoot them down with a silenced pistol. The gardener nearby can get spooked, so knocking him out beforehand can be beneficial as well.

Disguise yourself as the Undertaker

The Undertaker roams the area next to the dugout grave. Nearby is a crate where another gardener is working. Knock him out and place him in the crate. Next, lure the Undertaker with a thrown item conveniently into this direction and do the same to him. Pick up his clothes after doing so.

Inform the Staff Member that you are ready for Alexa Carlisle

Report to the Maid outside of the Graveyard to make her call our target.

Wait for Alexa Carlisle to arrive

[NATIVADS]

This opportunity is completed upon her arrival.

If you want to get a special kill, which unlocks another Challenge and is needed for another trophy, follow her around and speak to her. After about a minute and a half, she will stand right in front of the grave, while the guard conveniently looks away. Kick her in and use the shovel nearby to fill up the grave.

This finishes the Her Final Resting Place Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Dartmoor.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dartmoor (England) - A Day to Remember Walkthrough
contents.body:
A Day to Remember is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Dartmoor, England (Death in the Family quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 A Day to Remember.

[NATIVADS]

Make sure you track this from the Mission Stories Menu to be given waypoints where to go.

Disguise yourself as the Photographer

The photographer stands at the fountain in the Garden area behind the Manor. Overhear the conversation he’s having with the maid. Then you need to knock him out and get his diguise.

It is beneficial to knock out the guard looking in the direction of the photographer’s table, so you can knock him out unspotted and put him in the crate nearby. The maid faces away; you just have to check on the gardener nearby before making your move. Alternatively, you can throw a coin behind the bushes to lure him out of the guard’s sign.

Find the fuse cell

If you haven’t already found a fuse cell on your way here, you will now get a waypoint for one that’s inside a fuse box at the start of the garden area. To open the fuse box you need a crowbar, which you can find behind the greenhouse in that same area. Alternatively, you can find a fuse cell in the outside area between the Trophy Room and the Library, sitting on a crate.

Power up the Camera Flashes

47 needs to replace a Fuse Cell in the Box nearby (waypoint marker).

Take a Photo of the Staff Member

To adjust the camera, we need to take a picture of the Maid standing next to the chair.

Wait for the Staff Member to text down the Carlisle Family

[NATIVADS]

The maid will now inform the Family members to come to the Garden for the Photoshoot.

If you want to get a special kill, which unlocks another Challenge, you can tamper with the extension cord behind the chair and the waterline on the left side of the fountain to create a leak there. This will later fry our target upon pulling the camera trigger.

 

This finishes the A Day to Remember Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Dartmoor.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Chongqing (China) Certainty Principle Walkthrough
contents.body:
Certainty Principle is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Chongqing, China (End of an Era quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Certainty Principle.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. The clue that activates this storyline is found in the Restaurant. Overhear the woman talking to the board member. See the location below.

[NATIVADS]

Listen in on the conversation

Keep listening to them.

[NATIVADS]

Find the P41 form

You must now find the P41 form. It is in the apartment building across the street. A waypoint will mark the spot. The door is locked by a keypad. The Code is 0118.

Alternatively, you could also climb in via the roof (hang off the ledge of the roof and climb down).

Disguise yourself as the board member

Go back to the restaurant where you overheard the conversation. Get the disguise from the board member. You can throw something to distract the nearby cook, then quickly knock out the board member and disguise yourself without anyone noticing.

Talk to the guide / Follow the guide

The guide should be waiting in the stairwell behind the restaurant’s kitchen. Talk to her while disguised as the board member.

Then follow her inside the ICA facility. She will automatically interact with the keypad by a container that opens the ICA Entrance. For future playthroughs, remember the Code for this is also 0118 (it’s the same code for all ICA-related keypads in this level).

Approach the guards to get frisked

Inside the facility the guide will start your security clearance. You must get frisked by the guards — if you have any illegal items (firearms) in your inventory drop them where nobody can see. Only then you can get frisked.

Follow the guide / Hack a computer to let Olivia in to the system

Keep follow the guide into the facility. At one point a 60 second timer will start and you must find a computer to stop the timer. The same room where the timer starts has a PC on the left. Get the Access Dongle from the desk in that room and aim your camera at the panel by the window in front of the PC. This will darken the window so the person on the other side can’t see you interacting with the PC.

Keep following the guide afterward until she introduces you to Royce.

Follow Royce

Follow Royce throughout the facility. She will walk you through the core and eventually lead you to her office which has a big console to interact with.

Listen to Royce

Royce will tell you that her algorithms can predict people’s behavior. For a demonstration of this, she gives you a choice of 3 ICA employees who you can fire and she has predicted what each of them will do.

After Royce is done talking this mission branch will finish. You can now take her out however you like. It’s a good idea to make a Manual Save here so you can reload it later for different Challenges.

This finishes the Certainty Principle Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 China Chongqing.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Chongqing (China) Impulse Control Walkthrough
contents.body:
Impulse Control is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Chongqing, China (End of an Era quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Impulse Control.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. It should give you a marker on Map Floor 01 at the end of the road. There are some homeless people behind a building talking about a job opportunity. Overhear them for the clue that starts this.

[NATIVADS]

Disguise yourself as a homeless person

Take out one of the homeless people in the alleyway and take on their disguise. For example, there’s a man sleeping on the floor in the alley around the corner. He’s easy to take out without anyone noticing (just throw something at his head).

Find the entrance to the homeless shelter

The homeless shelter entrance is at the same building where you overheard the homeless people, just on the other side of the building. See the map location circled red below.

 

Follow the guard

Get frisked and follow the guard. If you hold any illegal items (firearms) you’ll want to leave them in the alley.

Wait your turn

You are brought to a waiting area for your “job interview”. Just wait here for a moment until the lady calls you.

Take a seat

Sit down with the lady. You are informed that no more test subjects are needed for this night.

Find the test subject on the top floor / Disguise yourself as the test subject

In the same building you need to head upstairs. There are many ways to do this. For example, before the guard comes to escort you back outside, you could take a right turn, distract the two guards by the stairs and knock them out. Or you could let the guard escort you back outside and enter the building via the rooftops with a disguise. There are lots of ways inside.

Note: All Door Codes in this building are 2552. This will let you use some shortcuts to the upper floor.

Once you’ve reached the top floor where Hush (your target) awaits, you’ll need to enter the bathroom and knock out the test subject there. Hide his body and take his disguise. See the location circled red below.

 

Inform the researcher that you are ready

Talk to the researcher by the test chairs, she will be marked.

Wait for everyone to arrive / Take a Seat

Now just wait for the lead doctor to arrive and take a seat. The story branch will complete at this point.

This finishes the Impulse Control Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 China Chongqing.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Chongqing (China) All-Seeing Eyes Walkthrough
contents.body:
All-Seeing Eyes is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Chongqing, China (End of an Era quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 All-Seeing Eyes.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. The waypoint marker will be on a rooftop to the left of the default spawn position. To get up there you must enter the Laundromat. There’s a keypad by a locked door. Enter Code 0118 to open it. You find the laundromat on floor 01 on the map. See the location below.

Now head upstairs and overhear the guards talking to get the first objective. Also pick up the Sniper Rifle on the roof.

[NATIVADS]

Find the broken drone

The broken drone is on the rooftop. From where you found the Sniper Rifle, keep going up the stairs to the top of the roof. It’s on the edge of the roof.

Hack the drone using your camera

Use your camera to scan the drone.

Shoot down a drone / Shoot down more drones

Now comes the tricky part. Stand on the vantage point directly left of the broken drone. Then look where the picture below shows (see the red circle).

You will see 5 drones in the far distance moving left and right. You must shoot down all 5 drones! But you have limited ammo. Make a Manual Save between each drone. If you miss more than 4 bullets per drone it’s best to reload the save. This also completes the “Big Sister” Feat Challenge and will draw out Royce from her hiding spot. Remember you can zoom in the scope with  .

You’ll want to look where the drone “stops” for a moment to turn around. They all fly left and right on fixed paths, but they stop on each side for a second to turn around. You just need to keep aiming at the very point where the drone makes its turnaround, because that’s where it’s slowest. Don’t try following the drone with your scope, just keep it centered on that one point where the drone always turns around.

Below are the best spots to aim at for each drone (going from left to right).

Drone #1

Drone #2

Drone #3 – same spot as Drone #4 (between chimneys)

Drone #4 – same spot as Drone #3 (between chimneys)

Drone #5

Shoot the remaining drones

Two more drones will spawn but these are easy. Head to the roof below where you found the Sniper. These drones aren’t far away so it’s easier to use your pistol to shoot them down.

Drone #6

Drone #7

Listen in on Royce

[NATIVADS]

Royce and Hush will have an argument. Royce thinks it’s Hush who shot down her drones and wants to meet him at the Lotus passage to confront him.

Wait for the meetup in the Lotus Passage

Both targets will now get together at the Lotus Passage, to which you have free aim from the vantage point where you shot the drones. The mission story will complete here. How you kill them is up to you, but there are a few challenges such as killing both with 1 bullet of a Sniper Rifle. Go through your Challenge List and try to combine as many as possible. Keep a Manual Save from before killing them.

This finishes the All-Seeing Eyes Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 China Chongqing.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Mendoza (Argentina) - The Tour Walkthrough
contents.body:
The Tour is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Mendoza, Argentina (The Farewell quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 The Tour.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. The waypoint marker will lead you to the entrance of the Wine Production Room by the Grapefields on Floor Level 00. Here you can overhear the Chief Winemaker for the clue that starts all this.

Disguise yourself as the chief winemaker

Follow the Chief Winemaker through the grapefields until he stops by a table. There will be one worker with him. Go around the corner to the left and turn on the waterpump to make some noise. This will attract the worker. Knock him out, hide the body. Then turn on the waterpump again to attract the chief, knock him out and grab his disguise.

Join the guests

Backtrack to where you got the first clue. The guests (Diana your friend & Tamara your target) should already be waiting for you.

Present the fermentation room

Now you will be playing the tour guide. Walk them inside the fermentation room and go through the marked talking points.

[NATIVADS]

Present the barrel room

Move over to the barrel room and go through the marked talking points there.

Finish the tour

Now head up the stairs to the Barrel Room. Wait for the guests at the end of the room. Then a door opens and Don Yates (2nd target) shows up. This story branch will now complete and it actually transitions into a secret 4th story called “Closing Statement“. Don’t kill your targets yet. You’ll want to do that other story branch because it leads to more Challenges and the Evil Wine Club trophy / achievement if you complete it!

This finishes The Tour Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Mendoza.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Mendoza (Argentina) - Closing Statement Walkthrough
contents.body:
Closing Statement is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Mendoza, Argentina (The Farewell quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Closing Statement.

How to Reveal Mission Story

This is a secret Story Branch that triggers after completing “The Tour” Story Branch. See The Tour Walkthrough. As soon as you finish that (when Don meets Tamara in Barrel Room), let them walk away and “Closing Statement” instantly gets added to your log. The specific trigger is when Don tells his guard at the end of the tour to get a bottle of wine from the Sommelier.

Disguise yourself as the Sommelier

In the Barrel Room you can drop down the sides into the tunnels below. Just walk around all edges of the Barrel Room until you find a point with the  /  Drop Down prompt. There is a vent on the side of the tunnel closest to the Sommelier. You will need a screwdriver to open this vent. If you don’t have one, you can find a Screwdriver in the Tech Room (named area on map). It’s directly to the left of the Barrel Room on the map (use  /  to scan for the Screwdriver in the corner of that room).

After you opened the vent you can access the Wine Fridge room where the Sommelier is. Wait for him to stand by the tunnel exit, climb to the ledge and pull him down. Alternatively, use the wall panel in this room to frost the windows, so the people outside can’t look in. Then you can knock out the Sommelier and the other guy in the room unnoticed.

Disable the lasers

The code to the lasers is 1945. Behind the lasers you find the wine bottle.

Acquire the 1945 Grand Paladin

Pick up the expensive wine bottle.

Follow the head of security

Bring the bottle to the guard who asked for it. He’ll be in the Barrel Room.

Present the 1945 Grand Paladin (Optional)

Follow the guard upstairs. On your way you get frisked so dispose of any illegal items (guns) to go ahead. You will be led into a basement where Don is holding a meeting. Place the wine on the table and tell the people some history about the wine.

Observe Meeting

Stand back and let the meeting play out. It will take a few minutes. Don wants to kill Diana. Tamara doesn’t agree with this, so Don orders his guards to shoot her (counts towards Murder by Proxy Challenge).

 
 
 

Get to Diana

Wait for the guards to walk Diana up the stairs to the upstairs bedroom.

Take out the top floor guards

[NATIVADS]

Now take out the 3 guards. One at the stairs, two on the balconies. Hide their bodies quickly! Don and his guards are about to come, you can’t leave any bodies in sight.

Talk to Diana

Have a quick chat with Diana. She tells you to sit down on the chair.

Wait for Yates

Just wait in the room until Don Yates arrives. It will take a little while.

Watch the confrontation / Take out Security

Diana will stab Don Yates. Quickly take out the two guards in the room after this happens.

Eliminate Yates

Diana has set up the kill but you still need to push in the knife. Interact with Don’s body on the floor (  /  ).

Hide the body

Hide the body here in the bedroom or the attached bathroom.

Disguise yourself appropriately

[NATIVADS]

Still in the same room you can take the Agent 47 suit off the coat rack in the corner by the fireplace. You’re all done now, that was the last step.

 

This finishes the Closing Statement Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Mendoza and unlocks the Evil Wine Club trophy or achievement (Attend the secret Providence meeting).

contents.title: Hitman 3 Mendoza (Argentina) - Eyes On Target Walkthrough
contents.body:
Eyes On Target is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Mendoza, Argentina (The Farewell quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Eyes On Target.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. You won’t get an objective right away. Instead, you get a waypoint marker high up and to the left of the default starting area. This marks two snipers on a silo overlooking the estate. There are basically two ways to get there. You can either get a Mercenary Disguise (armed guys in black clothes) and walk to the far left from the start where many of them are standing by the parked cars. There you can head through a door to the Silos. Alternatively, you could infiltrate the Villa Grounds in whatever way you want (e.g. get disguise from lawyer in white tuxedo with a suitcase, who spawns by the parked cars at the default mission start, then get frisked by the Gauchos on the villa path). No matter how you get there, simply go up the staircase of the Silo and stand behind the Snipers while they talk to get the first objective.

Disguise yourself as a Gaucho

You must get a Gaucho disguise. These are the armed guards all around the lower Gardens leading up to the Villa (just under the Silo with Snipers). It will mark a specific one for you, but that will be an enforcer. It’s easier to knock out some other Gaucho in the field, doesn’t matter from which one you take the disguise.

Steal a Spotter’s Earpiece

The Spotter’s Earpiece gets marked automatically. It’s between two enforcers. Crouch in the grass and turn on the radio to distract them, then quickly grab the earpiece without being seen.

Equip Camera

Select Camera from Item Wheel.

Scan Practice Target

Aim the camera at the Watermelons, which are just in front of where you found the earpiece (marked objective).

Scan Tamara Vidal

Tamara will now get marked. She’s one of the two main targets of this mission. Go find her wherever she is. Then use your camera as before to scan here. If you can’t get close to her, zoom in with  .

Talk to Diana

Talk to Diana to let her know to move to the gardens, from where the Sniper Team has free aim at Tamara. Diana will be marked in blue outline when you hold  /  and she’s always close to Tamara. You can be a few meters away from her to start the conversation. Approach from a side where the Bodyguards aren’t watching.

Dispose of Vidal’s Bodyguards

Now follow the ladies. Diana will lead the way and makes up an excuse that she wants to go to the garden to smoke. Tamara will follow her. Their 3 bodyguards will stop in the gardens, out of sight from the guests. Sneak up from behind and take them down one by one. It’s good to create a save here in case something goes wrong.

Order the Shot

Get close to Tamara so the  /  prompt “Give Kill Order” shows up. The snipers will shoot her for you. Target killed, Story branch complete.

This last step may be a bit buggy for some players. Sometimes it just shows “Mission Story Missed” even though the Snipers shoot her. I had to reload the save like 10 times until it finally counted. I gave the kill order while Diana said ” But humor me, Tamara. If you absolutely had to go, how would you choose?”.

This finishes the Eyes On Target Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Mendoza.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Mendoza (Argentina) - Over The Top Walkthrough
contents.body:
Over the Top is a Mission Story in Hitman 3 Mendoza, Argentina (The Farewell quest). This walkthrough will guide you through all objectives of Hitman 3 Over the Top.

How to Reveal Mission Story

As usual, track it from the Mission Stories menu after starting the level. A green marker will show you where to go for the clue. It’s on Floor Level 02 in the Fermentation Atrium. There will be two workers (blue clothes) talking about a pump malfunction that makes the wine tanks overflow. Should these guys not be talking, just follow them around for a while or restart the mission and go there right away.

Follow the senior worker

One of the two workers will start to head downstairs after they finish the conversation. Walk after him. You should already be in a suitable disguise at this point to make it easier.

Disguise yourself as a worker

Get one of the worker disguises (blue clothes). You can just backtrack to where you overheard the two workers, one of them should now be alone and is an easy target. Alternatively, many are found around the Fermentation Room and Wine Production Room.

Find a screwdriver

A Screwdriver is found in the Tech Room which you can enter from either the Production Room or Barrel Room. Scan with  /  to highlight it, in the corner of that room.

Find a wrench

A wrench is found in the Wine Production Room, on a blue toolbox along the big purple pump tube.

Expose the electrical wire

Use the screwdriver to expose the electrial wire in the Fermentation Room. If a worker is watching, throw something to distract him.

Sabotage the wine pump

Quickly use the wrench on the wine pump while the workers are still distracted (or throw something again to keep them distracted).

The mission branch finishes at this point. The pump will malfunction and this makes the wine storage overflow. There will be wine covering the whole floor. A fuse and fusebox can be found in the Wine Production Room. Wait for your target Don Yates to come running. He will step in the wine and you can power on the electrical wire for an “accident” kill.

 

This finishes the Over the Top Mission Story Path in Hitman 3 Mendoza.

contents.title: Hitman 3 All Door Codes & Safe Codes Combinations
contents.body:
This guide shows all Door Codes & Safe Codes Combinations in Hitman 3. All Keycodes in the game are fixed and will be the same for all players on each playthrough. Knowing these will save you some time.

Dubai Codes

  • 4706 (Door, Staff Area) – Door Code to Staff Area on Floor Level 00 which you can enter from the Atrium (behind the bar). You can see the code on a whiteboard in the Meeting Room on Floor Level 00.
  • 4706 (Door, Atrium) – Door Code between Atrium and Staff Area on Floor Level 00. This is the door in the bottom map corner of the Atrium (same code as the other door). You can see the code on a whiteboard in the Meeting Room on Floor Level 00.
  • 6927 (Safe, Security Room Floor 02) – Safe Code Floor Level 02, Security Room. Contains Evacuation Keycard that you can use on two panels in the Penthouse 5th & 4th floor to trigger the evacuation sequence of the two targets. Same code as 3rd floor Security Room.
  • 6927 (Safe, Security Room Floor 03) – Safe Code Floor Level 03, Security Room. Contains Evacuation Keycard that you can use on two panels in the Penthouse 5th & 4th floor to trigger the evacuation sequence of the two targets. Same code as 2nd floor Security Room.
  • 7465 (Safe, Penthouse Guest Bedroom) – Safe in the Guest Bedroom in the Penthouse, Floor Level 05. Contains a Tablet with Intel. The code is on a blue sticky note on the computer screen in the same room (Thanks to Angelweaver for sharing this in the comments).

Dartmoor Codes

  • 1975 (Safe, Case File) – Safe Code containing the Case File. In Alexa Carlisle’s Office on 2nd floor. Press the button on her office chair and it will reveal a safe behind a picture frame. You’d normally find out this code by looking at the 4 symbols above the safe (Clock, Telescope, Fire, Moose) and finding these objects around the manor which have numbers on the walls next to them. The code is always the same so you can skip all that and enter it directly.

Berlin Codes

  • 1989 (Safe, Hirschmüller’s Office) – Safe Code for Floor -02 Hirschmüller’s Office, contains Cocaine Brick and Gold Idol bust. You get the code by overhearing two employees talking and saying the code is the same year the Berlin wall was taken down (which was in year 1989) – thanks to Osiris for sharing this in the comments.

Chongqing Codes

  • 0118 (Door, Container) – Container Door Code to the ICA Facility Entrance. You can find this out by overhearing some people in front of the container talking about it and one of them will also enter the code to enter the facility and say it out loud. Same code combination as the apartment with the P41 form.
  • 0118 (Door, ICA Apartment) – Door Code to the ICA Apartment that contains the P41 Form, on Floor Level 02 of an apartment building. You can find out this code by climbing into the same apartment from the roof and listening to the answering machine. Same code combination as the Container Entrance to ICA Facility.
  • 0118 (Door, Laundromat) – Door Code in the Laundromat, on Floor Level 01. Leads to the roof for All-Seeing Eyes Story.
  • 2552 (Door, Benchmark Lab) – Door Code to the staircase in the Benchmark Lab, Floor Level 04 (building where “Hush”, the mission target is). You can find this out by looking at a whiteboard on the top floor (5th floor) of the same building.
  • 2552 (Door, Hush’s Private Lab) – Door Code to Therapy Room which you access by going to the balcony from Hush’s Private Lab. You can find this out by looking at a whiteboard on the same floor, behind a wall where Royce likes to stand around near a patient in a chair.
  • 2552 (Door, Arcade) – Door Code inside the Arcade on Floor Level 00.
  • 2552 (Secret Hatch) – In the fenced area behind the Arcade are two Street Guards and a keypad on a wall (Floor Level 00). Enter code 2552 to unlock the secret hatch. This also completes Discovery Challenge “Quite a Hatch”.

Mendoza Codes

  • 1945 (Laser System) – Door Code to shut off the Laser System to the Wine Fridge on Floor Level 01 (Wine Cellar where the Sommelier is). The code is the same as the year the wine was mode, which is the year 1945 Grand Paladin. A guard talking to the Sommelier also says the code “is the last year of World War II”.
  • 2006 (Safe, Villa Basement) – Safe Code for the Villa Basement, contains important Intel and completes a Challenge. You’d normally find out the code by overhearing two guards outside the Yateses Villa by the cliffside. They mention the code is the wedding year of the Yateses. Upstairs in their villa you can find a calendar on the wall from the year 2021 which has their wedding anniversary circled as “Crystal Anniversary”. Crystal means 15 years and 2021 – 15 = 2006 which is the code.

Carpathian Mountains Codes

  • 1979 (Door) – Door Code at the start of the mission (shown on the poster directly left of the door).

That’s all known Codes and Combinations in Hitman 3.

contents.title: Hitman 3 All Shortcuts Locations
contents.body:
itman 3 has 17 Shortcut Locations across its six maps. Finding 15 shortcuts unlocks the Shortcut Killer trophy or achievement. This guide shows the locations of all Shortcuts in Hitman 3.

Very likely, you will see the locked shortcuts from the inaccessible side when you first approach them. They are either ladders / fire escapes, which have to be lowered down, or doors which are blocked from the other side. Some shortcuts require a Crowbar to be opened.

Once opened, they will be available for you on later playthroughs.

Dubai – 4 Shortcuts

Penthouse Terrace Ladder

Easily reached on Level 4, located on the large open terrace.

Ventilation Area Ladder

Also located on Level 4, on the opposite side of the previous one.

Atrium Lobby Door

Located on Level -1; this one needs to be accessed from Level 0, through the bathrooms and the maintenance area, heading down the stairs.

Helipad Ladder

Just past the emergency exit on the way to the Helipad on Level 3.

Dartmoor – 2 Shortcuts

Balcony Ladder

Located on Level 1 – the Balcony of Zachary’s Room (the one where the Investigation starts).

Maintenance Ladder

This Shortcut is well hidden but can be helpful for a Silent Assassin, Suit Only playthrough. To open it, you need to get to Level 3, which is within Alexas Office. You can climb up to a ledge from the stairs. then shimmy along the ledge above the stairs and climb out of the window.

Berlin – 3 Shortcuts

Entrance Backdoor

Located a bit behind the regular guest-entrance section (Level 0).

Biker Basement Door

Accessed through the Bikers Clubhouse (Level 0).

Skylight Ladder

While the Shortcut itself is located at Level 1, you need to go through the Skylight on Roof-Level 2 and climb down to access it.

Chongqing – 3 Shortcuts

Facility Elevator Shaft

This Shortcut at Level 0 proves to be quite useful, as it will enable a quick access to the ICA Facility through the Elevator Shaft. Can be accessed from Level -1, near the Tier 1 Security section.

Inner Courtyard

Pretty quick to access; located on Level 1, through the Inner Courtyard.

The Block Ladder

Hidden in the corner of a balcony on Level 2 of the house with primary target Hush.

Mendoza – 3 Shortcuts

Cellar Door

One out of two Shortcuts which can be accessed from the Villa Basement (Level 3).

Backdoor

Taking the curved way around the mansion towards the bottom reveals this Shortcut on Level 2.

Maintenance Door

The second Shortcut which can be accessed from the Villa Basement (Level 3).

Carpathian Mountains – 2 Shortcuts

Passenger Car Door

The train-car after the prominent workbench has a closed-off section, which can be entered through its window. You need to continue straight ahead to the next possible window and backtrack to this spot, which isn’t too far.

Container Door

A later train-car has a container which you would normally have to climb. Its backside has an empty spot for a valve, exactly like one you previously used. There is one in the upcoming train-car, which you can use.

These are all Shortcuts in Hitman 3 for you to use.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dartmoor (England) - All Undiscovered Areas Locations
contents.body:
The Dartmoor Map (Death in the Family) in Hitman 3 has a total of 22 Areas you need to uncover for the Master of the Household Trophy / Achievement. This guide shows where to find them and how to access them all.

A good disguise is the Private Investigator as he is allowed in almost every room of the entire map. He may only be on Level 2, if the investigation has progressed and you want to present your results/conclusions.

A Master Key can be found in the Butlers Mr. Fernsby’s Office. This one is very useful to open locked doors without the suspicion of using a Lockpick or Crowbar. However, entering his office does need forced entry. You can find a crowbar behind the greenhouse in the outside garden area.

Level 0

  1. Graveyard: southern outer part of the map
  2. Garden: western part of the map
  3. Greenhouse: western outer part of the map
  4. Foyer: entry to the house
  5. Library: going clockwise, the large room to the left
  6. Trophy Room: continuing clockwise, the large room in the top left area
  7. Sitting Room: continuing clockwise, the large main room in the middle of the whole map
  8. Dining Room: continuing clockwise, the large room in the top right area
  9. Kitchen: continuing clockwise, a room in the bottom right area
  10. Staff Room: adjacent to the previous room
  11. Mr. Fernsby’s Office: adjacent to the previous room. Locked by default. Holds a Master Key to the House

Level 1

  1. Emma and Gregory’s Room: top left corner. Locked by default
  2. Secret Room (1): Probably the trickiest to get into. Needs the walking cane from Gregory’s Room, which must be placed in a Mysterious Switch Socket on the ground. This is the upper floor of the Library, facing the corner towards West.
  3. Rebecca’s Room: bottom right corner
  4. Secret Room (2): can be entered from either Rebecca’s Room (interact with picture) or the Small Office occupied by the lawyer (interact with book)
  5. Small Office: northern side of the house
  6. Zachary’s Room: top right corner. This room would be the first to start the investigation, if you opt to play as the Private Investigator
  7. Secret Room (3): can be entered from Zachary’s Room (interact with book)

Level 2

  1. Alexa Charlisle’s Bedroom: bottom part of this floor
  2. Alexa Charlisle’s Office: upper part of this floor
  3. Private Room: adjacent to the Office
  4. Secret Room: can be entered from the Private Room

Level 3

Has no areas to discover.

That’s all Dartmoor locations in Hitman 3 and will earn you the Master of the Household trophy or achievement.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Dartmoor (England) How to Get Case File
contents.body:
The Death in the Family level (Dartmoor, England) in Hitman 3 requires you to find a Case File. This guide explains how to get the case file.

  1. The Case File is located in a safe in Alexa Carlisle’s Office on the 2nd floor. You can head there straight away, no need to defeat Alexa or gather any clues!
  2. The 2nd floor requires a Bodyguard disguise. You can find an isolated Bodyguard in the Trophy Room on the ground floor, he’s easy to take out in stealth. There are also some single bodyguards on the 2nd floor balconies.
     
  3. Now you can walk past the guards on the top floor. Enter the first door on the right to the big office.
  4. Press the button on the office chair. This reveals a safe behind a picture to the left.
  5. Enter the safe code 1975 to open the safe.
  6. Pick up the Case file from the safe. That’s the Case File location, all done.

Alternatively, you can solve the Murder Mystery (see Means, Motive and Opportunity Story Walkthrough), then after you report your findings to Alexa you can ask for the Case File as your reward. In this scenario she opens the safe for you.

Normally, the way you’d find out the safe code is by looking at the 4 symbols above the safe (Clock, Telescope, Fire, Moose). Then you’d have to find those 4 objects around the manor, each of them has the corresponding number on a wall. The code 1975 is fixed and the same for each player on each playthrough.

And that’s where you find the case file in Hitman 3 Dartmoor. Now just take out Alexa and exfiltrate the mission area.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Berlin (Germany) - All Undiscovered Areas Locations
contents.body:
The Berlin Map (Apex Predator) in Hitman 3 has a total of 22 Areas you need to uncover for the Followed the Trails Trophy / Achievement. This guide shows where to find them and how to access them all.

Level -2

  1. Hirschmüller’s Office: top right area of lowest party-floor
  2. DJ Booth: in front of the Dance Floor
  3. Dance Floor: main middle section
  4. Boiler Room: to the right of the Dance Floor
  5. Basement Bar: lower left section of the floor

Level -1

  1. Pipe Room: left side of this floor
  2. Projection Bar: lower left side of this floor

Level 0
  1. Club Hölle: outside area of the Club, where the queue is lining up
  2. Club Entrance: section behind the bouncers
  3. Wadrobe: past the entrance section
  4. Water Channels: right-hand-side of the area; outside of the main compound
  5. Chill Out: outside area within the Club
  6. Red Toilet: upper left side of the Club
  7. Back Entrance: walking alongside the building on its left side, leading to section where Bikers hang around
  8. Drug Packaging: inside of the Bikers Club, in a narrow room
  9. Biker Hangout: lower area of the Biker Club
  10. Garage: right-hand-side area of the Biker Club
  11. Juice Bar: backside area of the Bar which can be seen from the Chill Out Area

Level 1

  1. Grow House: small pot-farm in the middle of the floor

Level 2

  1. Sniper Nest: lookout in the lower right section of the Club

Level 3

  1. Overpass: connection between the two Clubs

Level 4

  1. Radio Tower: needs backtracking to open the gate with key/crowbar

That’s all Berlin locations in Hitman 3 and will earn you the Followed the Trails trophy or achievement.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Chongqing (China) - All Undiscovered Areas Locations
contents.body:
The Chongqing Map (End of an Era) in Hitman 3 has a total of 29 Areas you need to uncover for the Surveillance Master Trophy / Achievement. This guide shows where to find them and how to access them all.

Level -3

  1. Core Control Room: north of the Core itself
  2. The Data Core: your primary objective after killing the two mandatory targets

Level -2

  1. Break Room: located to the left side
  2. Royce’s Office: located to the top left side
  3. Analysis Area: main area to the north
  4. Service Tunnels: accessed through vents which can be removed through scanning
  5. Tier 2 Security: lower right section. Needs proper disguise to obtain a Tier 3 Dongle. Far right side has the Armory which holds explosives to pick up

Level -1

  1. ICA Entrance Checkpoint: first area upon descending the stairs into the compound
  2. Tier 1 Security: located on the left side of the area
  3. ICA Employee Vetting: top-right side of this floor
  4. Resting Capsules: bottom right-hand corner of this floor

Level 0

  1. Yuzhong Square: main square / hub of this level
  2. Arcade: entered from street level right off the main street

Level 1

  1. Laundromat: northern section; can be entered from main entrance as well as from the backside via some stairs
  2. OK Karaoke: northern section, next to the Laundromat
  3. Zhao’s Appartment: Appartment-building can be entered from Street-Level 0
  4. Restaurant: can be entered from Street-Level 0
  5. Inner Courtyard: southern side; needs disguise to enter. Can be bypassed by the walkways/bridges further to the south and dropped down into the yard
  6. Oneelectrics Store: is basically Street-Level, too – just a bit more elevated than the other stores

Level 2

  1. ICA Apartment: needs code (0118) to enter
  2. Recruitment Station: top right building, can be entered from Street-Level

Level 3

  1. Derelict Apartments: middle floor of the building

Level 4

  1. Benchmark Lab: penultimate floor of the building. Can be accessed from either one story below, above (own roof) or the adjacent Rooftop
  2. Northeastern Rooftop: can be entered from the Apartment Floors below or the adjacent complex

Level 5

  1. Glorious Leap Sign: top left corner of the map
  2. Therapy Room: top left room of the complex’ floor
  3. Hush’s Private Lab: middle section of the floor
  4. The Lotus Passage: connection between southern and northern roof
  5. Southeastern Rooftop: accessed by lower floors or Lotus Passage

That’s all Chongqing locations in Hitman 3 and will earn you the Surveillance Master trophy or achievement.

contents.title: Hitman 3 Mendoza (Argentina) - All Undiscovered Areas Locations
contents.body:
The Mendoza Map (The Farewell) in Hitman 3 has a total of 45 Areas you need to uncover for the Master the Terroir Trophy / Achievement. This guide shows where to find them and how to access them all.

Level 0
  1. Chardonnay Field: lower section of the grapevines
  2. Grape Shed: the building within the grapevines
  3. Grapefield Roads: middle main path within the grapevines
  4. Malbec Field: upper section of the grapevines
  5. Cinema: lower right section of main building complex; spans across several floors
  6. Production Room: main working place in the middle of the complex
  7. Staff Locker Room: top left area of Production Room
  8. Staff Restroom: top left area of Production Room
  9. Fermentation Room: right-hand-side of the Production Facility

Level 1

  1. Tech Room: left side of the upper Production Facility
  2. Barrel Room: main middle section of the upper Production Facility
  3. Wine Fridge: right side of the upper Production Facility. Needs to be entered by dropping down ledges on the Barrel Room side and pulling yourself up on the other side again

Level 2

  1. Grapefield Cliff: small path between the entry point and the fields
  2. Parking Lot: continuing the street to the crowded section
  3. Parking Area and Tunnel: fenced off, next to Parking Lot. Needs proper disguise
  4. Security Tunnel: just behind the little guards office
  5. Boatdock: main square / hub of this level
  6. Dance Floor: crowded section in the middle of the map
  7. Reception: Foyer between the outer and inner sections of the party
  8. Fermentation Atrium: large main room of the floor
  9. Tasting Room: bottom-most room on the floor; above the Cinema
  10. Bathroom: above the Reception-area
  11. Security Room: adjacent to the Bathroom; needs Keycard to enter
  12. Secret Tunnel: long-winded tunnel around the property
  13. Armory: room off the Secret Tunnel
  14. Backside: far right side of the property, at the end of the Secret Tunnel. Leads to a Shortcut, if going towards the bottom side

Level 3

  1. Silo: top left edge of the map
  2. Lower Gardens: top left area of the map
  3. Higher Gardens: top left area of the map
  4. Villa Basement: entered through the Foyer
  5. Asado: upper outside section with many party guests

Level 4
  1. Security Checkpoint: right where you start on your first playthrough. Needs proper disguise
  2. Viewing Platform: along the path; your first objective
  3. Villa Front Yard: the section between the Villa and the Asado
  4. Villa Back Yard: the garden on the backside of the Mansion
  5. Villa Foyer: main entry of the Mansion
  6. Villa Guest Room: to the right of the Foyer
  7. Villa Living Room: to the left of the Foyer

Level 5

  1. Villa Roof: the large orange roof section
  2. Villa Office: main room of the upper Villa floor
  3. Villa Bedroom: just adjacent to the Office with no real border between them
  4. Villa Bathroom: just off the Bedroom
  5. Villa Front Balcony: overlooking the Front Yard to the Asebo
  6. Villa Back Balcony: overlooking the far upper end of the map

Level 6

  1. Villa Attic: accessed through a ladder in the Bathroom

That’s all Mendoza locations in Hitman 3 and will earn you the Master the Terroir trophy or achievement.
